Text: Thanks for the upload. By any chance could you upload Carnage 4. I can't seem to find it any where.

I dot want to sound like a dick,but I love it when people can't find certain issues ''anywhere''.Just to make one thing clear - if I'm uploading certain series regularly,then I'll upload certain issue when it's out...I'm uploading carnage regularly and you can't find issue 4 ''anywhere'' 'cause it's not out yet...when it comes out I'll upload it.That clear enough?
My apologies on that I read somewhere that it came out a few weeks ago. Should of done more research. Once again thank you for upload all these series for us. :)
mirrormaster82............thanks again for getting all of this out to the rest of us. Seriously. Thanks Man!

mirrormaster will you also be uploading/updating  the gears of war comics? cause #17 should come out this week just making sure
thanks anyways ;)
Don't read gears of war...won't be uploading it...sorry...
